name: Shapeocalypse
description:
Shapeshift into a circle, square or triangle and avoid crashing into the obstacles in the tunnel to get a score as high as possible while enjoying the colors of the tunnel moving to the beat of the music.

And try not to get a headache. Seriously.

Use 1, 2 and 3 to change into a circle, a square or a triangle.
Move with WASD or cursor keys.
